name: Ho Ho Ho !!!
description:
Ho Ho Ho, Santa Claus is almost here! Load your fists with snow and get ready for battle with players from all around the world. The best game to spend your free time especially during holidays.

This is the time we all have been waiting for! You don't have snow in your country or is it too cold to go and play outside? No problem! Because now you have a great snowball fight game on your device to play with your friends or other worldwide players. Now you have another reason to cheer other than the celebrations of New Year! It is for you, being the last survivor of this exciting battle!

Choose from a variety of different characters like Santa Claus, Elf, Reindeer, Snowman, Christmas Tree and many more and begin the snow war. Throw snowballs to other players and avoid their hits, so that you don't run out of health and manage to be the last man standing. Try every map, discover their secrets and good spots for better view and attacks, and become the winner.


*** Multiplayer Features ***

- Worldwide and local
- Unique amazing maps that you will fall in love at first sight. And new maps are already in the making, so we are sure you won’t be disappointed!
- Chat mode is available so you can chat with your friends and colleagues during the game
- Team match and death match mode!
- Exciting experience that can really get you hooked!
- Amazing background music and sound effects
